snippet: Jeremy Bernard, the White House social secretary, and M. C. González, Michelle Obama’s communications director, are leaving just as Mrs. Obama is increasing her profile.
abstract: Jeremy Bernard, the White House social secretary, and M C Gonzalez, communications director for Michelle Obama, are latest in string of East Wing staff members to depart 1600 Pennsylvania Ave as Barack Obama's presidency nears its end; latest changes follow abrupt departure of White House florist Laura Dowling, reportedly walked out of building by security in February.
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Bernard, the White House social secretary, and M. C. González, Michelle Obama’s communications director, are leaving just as Mrs. Obama is increasing her profile.

headline.main: Mrs. Obama’s Wing of White House Is Having Its Share of Transition at Key Time
headline.print_headline: Mrs. Obama’s Wing of White House Is Having Its Share of Transition at Key Time
